origin: In this tutorial we show how to train your own structured forest using author's initial Matlab implementation.
local: 在本教程中，我们将展示如何使用作者最初的Matlab实现来训练您自己的结构化林。

origin: Place compiled mex file into root dir and run edgesDemo. You will need to wait a couple of hours after that the new model will appear inside models/forest/.
local: 将编译好的mex文件放入根目录并运行edgesDemo。在新模型出现在models/forest/中之后，您需要等待几个小时。

origin: The final step is converting trained model from Matlab binary format to YAML which you can use with our ocv::StructuredEdgeDetection. For this purpose run opencv_contrib/ximgproc/tutorials/scripts/modelConvert(model, "model.yml")
local: 最后一步是将训练好的模型从Matlab二进制格式转换成YAML，您可以使用我们的ocv:：StructuredGeDetection。为此，运行opencv\u contrib/ximgproc/tutorials/scripts/modelConvert（model，“model.yml”）
